content.text: Channeler
Rift caster. Manipulate dimensional energy, reshape the battlefield. Abilities focus on enhancing casting, zone control, and turning toxicity into tactical advantage.
T1 — Baseline (Free)
Rift Sense (Passive): Detect dimensional anomalies, hidden rift creatures, and toxicity concentrations within Medium range without a check.
T2 — Pick from (300 cr each)
Focused Cast (Active, 1 AP): Your next rift pattern this turn gets +2 accuracy.
Toxicity Redirect (Passive): When you gain Toxicity from casting, redirect 1 point to an enemy within Close range. They gain +1 Toxicity instead.
Dimensional Read (Active, 1 AP): Learn one ability or stat of a target enemy within Medium range. GM reveals one piece of information.
Rift Shield (Active, 1 AP): Grant an ally within Close range +2 Evasion against the next attack targeting them. You bend local space around them.
Resonance (Passive): When you cast a rift pattern that hits, all allies within Close range heal 1 HP. Tiny but persistent — adds up over a long fight.
Contaminate Ground (Active, 1 AP): Designate a Close-range zone. Until end of your next turn, enemies that enter or start their turn in the zone gain +1 Toxicity. Area denial.
T3 — Pick from (600 cr each)
Rift Anchor (Active, 2 AP): Place an anchor at your location. Enemies within Close range of it take +2 Toxicity per turn. Lasts until end of your next turn.
Overcharge (Passive): When casting, voluntarily take +2 Toxicity to add Pen 1 (stacks with existing Pen).
Null Field (Active, 2 AP): An enemy within Medium range cannot use special abilities until end of your next turn. Attacks still function. You shut down their toolkit.
Rift Tether (Active, 1 AP): Tether an enemy within Medium range. If they move more than 1 range band, they take 1d6 armor-bypassing damage. Lasts until end of your next turn. Pins mobile enemies.
Dimensional Swap (Active, 2 AP): Swap positions with a willing ally within Medium range. Both of you teleport instantly. Repositioning without movement.
Feedback Loop (Passive): When an enemy within Close range casts a rift pattern or uses a magic ability, you regain 1 HP and reduce your Toxicity by 1. You feed on their dimensional output.
Rift Sight (Passive): You can see invisible, hidden, and dimensionally-phased enemies within Medium range. Stealth doesn’t work against you.
T4 — Pick from (1,000 cr each)
Dimensional Shatter (Active, 3 AP): All enemies within Close range make a Grit check (DC 8) or are Stunned. Once per encounter.
Rift Mastery (Passive): All rift patterns cost 1 less Toxicity (minimum 1). Rift Meditation works at any Toxicity level.

Singularity (Active, 3 AP): Create a gravity well at a point within Medium range. All enemies within Close range of that point are pulled toward it (1 range band) and have their speed reduced to 0 until end of your next turn. Once per encounter.
Dimensional Echo (Passive): When you cast a rift pattern, you may cast the same pattern again next turn for 0 Toxicity cost (still costs AP). The echo is a free repeat. Once per encounter.
